meanings.definition: The office or position of a clerk.
meanings.sent1: In the clerkdom, he organized files and answered calls.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to work in the clerkdom at the town hall.
meanings.sent3: The clerkdom had a party to celebrate a successful audit.
meanings.sent4: The clerkdom was a hive of activity, buzzing with paperwork.
meanings.sent5: The clerkdom bustled with efficiency, like a well-oiled machine.
